#summary The class attribute is a set of author-defined keywords for an element.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [DivElement <div> element] > *class attribute*

== Usage ==

The class attribute can contain any number of keywords, separated by spaces.  You can use each keyword for CSS styling of the element, or as part of a [MicroformatsTopic microformat], or for any other use.

== Elements ==

You can use the class attribute on any element.
